thread.title: Reince Priebus says Trump believe press is 'the enemy' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Reince Priebus says Trump believe press is 'the enemy' | Daily Mail Online

author: Keith Griffith For Dailymail.Com
title: Reince Priebus says Trump believe press is 'the enemy' | Daily Mail Online
text: 'Take it seriously': White House chief of staff says Trump wasn't kidding when he called the press 'the enemy of the American people' Reince Priebus says Americans should take Trump 'seriously' that press is enemy President Trump has stepped up his verbal attacks on the free press Tweeted Friday that the 'FAKE NEWS media' is 'enemy of the American people' Designated TV networks ABC, CBS, NBC plus New York Times and CNN 'enemies' Now Priebus doubles down in combative interview with CBS' John Dickerson Calls reporting on Trump administration 'grossly inaccurate' and 'total garbage' Cites reports that Trump campaign had extensive contact with Russians Asserts that press should only share info from 'heads' of agencies Published: 15:11 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 21:23 GMT, 19 February 2017 208 shares
